statements: UPDATE campaign_finances SET contribution_amount = 500.00, contributor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE campaign_finances SET contribution_amount = 5000.50, contributor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE campaign_contributions SET amount = 5000.00, date_received = '2022-09-15' WHERE contributor_id = 101
UPDATE expenses SET category = 'Marketing', amount = 2500.00 WHERE date_paid = '2022-08-20'

UPDATE donors SET donation_amount = 1500, donation_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE donor_id = 201
UPDATE campaign_finances SET funds_raised = funds_raised + 10000, expenditures = expenditures - 5000 WHERE campaign_id = 101
UPDATE donors SET donation_amount = donation_amount * 1.1 WHERE donor_id = 201
